Document.Focus: When your child's treatment stops working

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about When your child's treatment stops working
QAPair.Answer: Sometimes even the best treatments are not enough to stop cancer. Your child's cancer may have become resistant to anti-cancer drugs. It may have come back or kept growing despite several rounds of treatment. This can be a difficult time for you and your family as you make decisions about ongoing treatment and what comes next.
